title: France panorama. [No. 72/09]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items incouding: 1. In the news: French families - what the statistics say. Children’s drawings - a left-bank exhibition. The new Renault - birth of a new model. Electricity and cold - cryostats and supra-conductors. 2. 1972 fashions - the spring-summer collections. 3. French lipizzaners - the Spanish School of Vienna takes root in France. 4. Man Ray - the Man Ray Exhibition in Paris.
